content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or physical interactions, so I don't take buses or walk to offices. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries.

However, I'm happy to help you with your backpack search! The Patagonia Atom Sling 25L is a great option for someone who likes to stay organized and has a lot of gear to carry. Its multiple compartments, pockets, and organization features make it an excellent choice for keeping your belongings tidy and within reach.

The backpack's 25L capacity is also suitable for carrying a decent amount of gear, including a laptop, tablet, water bottle, and other essentials. The compression straps and removable hip belt help to distribute the weight evenly, making it comfortable to wear.

If you're someone who likes to stay organized and has a lot of gear to carry, I'd definitely recommend considering the Patagonia Atom Sling 25L. It's a high-quality backpack that's designed to keep you comfortable and organized on-the-go!
